query: Noosa Gravel Enduro gravel race Noosa Hinterland

videos.title: Noosa Enduro 2022 course preview by AMBmagazine - come ride in Queensland!
videos.description:
The Noosa Enduro has a place in Australia's mountain bike history, as a long-running event in the beautiful Noosa Hinterland. While it slipped off the event calendar for a decade, the Noosa Enduro came back with a bang in 2021, and the event became a weekend of off-road cycling with gravel events on the Sunday after the mountain bike events on Saturday.

Find out more: https://www.noosaenduro.com.au/

With the return of the popular event in 2022, the event team have really gone full gas, with more event distance options. They have even had the Sunday gravel race appointed the National Gravel Championships by AusCycling! It's a huge weekend to be a part of. Whether you bring the family, your mates, your partner or just your bike and sense of adventure, there's lots of options for events to take part in. And of course, a trip to Noosa and surrounds isn't too hard to find appealing in the middle of winter. Mark July 30-31st 2022 in your diary, as this is going to be a weekend away worth the wait.
__________________________________________________________________
0:00 - Welcome! All about the Noosa Enduro
0:36 - How to tackle the Noosa Enduro
0:52 - Course options for the 2022 Noosa Enduro
1:24 - What to expect
1:44 - Make a weekend of it!
1:59 - Stay for the gravel race
2:08 - Let's get rolling
2:26 - Onto the singletrack
2:45 - Using the checkpoints, first stop is Pomona
3:33 - There are two kinds of MTBers. Those who walk, and liars.
3:51 - On the Noosa Trail Network
4:21 - Why the Noosa Enduro is a must ride event
__________________________________________________________________

Want more? Don't forget to subscribe to our YouTube channel!
http://ambmag.com.au/

videos.title: Maxxis dominates Noosa Enduro 2025
videos.description:
What an incredible weekend at the Noosa Enduro!

Maxxis was proud to be a key partner of the event, supporting riders as they tackled the beautiful and varied terrain of the Noosa Hinterland.
Over the two days, we saw more than 1,000 competitors take part, ranging in age from 7 to 80, making it one of the most inclusive and family-friendly Gravel/Enduro events on the calendar.
  
Throughout the weekend, it was rewarding to hear firsthand how Maxxis tyres performed out on the course. It’s clear we remain a go-to choice for riders looking to conquer diverse and demanding gravel routes.
 
Beyond the ride, the Enduro Village was full of energy, with live music, delicious food, and an incredible community atmosphere.
  
Under the giant Maxxis tent in the event village, our friendly crew had the chance to connect with riders, chatting about all things MTB and Gravel, and help people find their perfect Maxxis tyre combo.
 
We also handed out over 150 swag bags to those who stopped by and scanned the code on our giveaway A-frame out front.
  
As always, we brought along informative and interactive signage, this time with a big focus on educating riders about our new HYPR-X compound tyre range. With hands-on product displays and our expert team available for questions, riders had everything they needed to learn more about Maxxis’ quality and innovation.
  
We also made sure our tent was a space where riders could get real support. In partnership with a local Queensland bike shop Venture Cycles, we offered event-only tyre deals and a special Maxxis Race Service, where competitors could purchase their preferred tyres and have them fitted by our team, free of charge. It was a hit and hugely appreciated by riders getting ready to race.
 
To top it all off, our team had the honour of joining the podium presentation, awarding Maxxis prizes to over 40 well-deserved podium finishers.
 
We’re already counting down to next year’s event and can’t wait to continue backing the gravel community with the best tyres and support in the game.

videos.title: Noosa Enduro 100, July 14 2024
videos.description: A great challenge to complete. It was a doozy!! Hectic hills, which the GoPro footage doesn't do justice, and downhills too, fast single track, cow paddocks, dirt roads, mud pits...also, some of the best scenery in the Noosa hinterland. A sunrise start, then it took me 7 1/2 hours (7:32) to complete. Such a great event and so well organised.

videos.title: Noosa Classic: 10 October 2021
videos.description:
The Cycling Classic for QLD is returning to the stunning Noosa Hinterland on Sunday, 10 October 2021.
 
💥New & improved, this year’s Noosa Classic will see the introduction of a time-trial challenge up the infamous Gyndier Drive on Saturday of the event weekend. The Gran Fondo rides will return on the Sunday, with your choice from the 160km Maxi Classic, 120km Challenge Classic, or the brand-new 65km Rouleurs Classic.
 
💥You asked, we’ve listened! eBikes will now be permitted in the 65km Rouleurs Classic.
 
➡️ Register now to secure your spot : www.noosaclassic.com.au

videos.title: Noosa Classic 2021 Official Event Video
videos.description: Relive the action from the Noosa Classic's third annual cycling Gran Fondo which took place on Sunday, 10 October 2021 through Queensland's sunny Noosa Hinterland.
